scripts.build: rm -rf build && packageName=$(npm pack) && tar -xvzf $packageName && mv package build && rm $packageName && cd build && npm i --production && find ./node_modules/* -mtime +10950 -exec touch {} \; && rm -f package-lock.json && cd ..
scripts.cf_package: npm run build && aws cloudformation package --template-file app-sam.json --s3-bucket my-cloudformation-code-artifacts --output-template-file app-output_sam.yaml
scripts.cf_deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file app-output_sam.yaml --stack-name ${npm_package_name} --region eu-west-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-override
scripts.deploy: npm run cf_package && npm run cf_deploy
